casebody.data:
CROWELL
v.
CROWELL 31A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 9, 2019 Thomas D. Bumgardner, Amy Simpson Fiorenza, Attorneys at Law, for Crowell, Andrea Kirby.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 4th of January 2019 by Defendant-Appellee:

*839"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of January 2019."

Defendant-Appellee shall have up to and including February 1, 2019, to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
